EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that their request is below the threshold - Pricing Strategy
EmailTemplate.name: WRF <24k Pricing Strategy
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Unable to Process: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}.
Unfortunately, this particular request falls under the threshold for us to assign an analyst.
Please contact the following for assistance with your request:
For new prospects and SFDC users, use the Self Service Pricing Tool for <$24k and choose Elite, Premier, or Custom.
For current customers and non-SFDC users, send request to the TDR Pricing Request email box.
Thank you,
BSD BIDS
